log-action-filter-mwoauthconsumer-propos: Shawarwarin mabukaci na OAuth (wanda aka amince da kansa)
mwoauth-error-callback-url-custom-protoc: Dole ne ku yi amfani da abokin ciniki mara sirri na OAuth 2 don ƙa'idodi na al'ada.
